txt.en:
[placeholder],

I've heard you have great promise in the martial ways of brawling! Come see me in the Bree Jail. There is a matter that requires such skills as you seem to possess, and furthermore you might learn something.

Brom Hawksbeard
'There you are! This will be a good test for the both of us: for you to learn something more of brawling, and for me to see if you have potential!'
You received a letter from Brom Hawksbeard, the Brawler trainer in Bree-town, asking to see you.
Bring the letter to Brom Hawksbeard in the Bree Jail
Brom Hawksbeard sent you a letter requesting that you visit him in the Bree Jail.\n\nDeliver the letter to Brom. He can be found in the Bree Jail.
